mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_login_log (id, logname, userid, createtime, succeed, message, ip) VALUES ( #{id}, #{logname}, #{userid}, #{createtime}, #{succeed}, #{message}, #{ip} )
mapper.select:
select * , u.name AS userName from sys_login_log log INNER JOIN sys_user u ON log.userid = u.id
and (createTime between CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59'))
and logname like CONCAT('%',#{logname},'%')
ORDER BY createtime DESC
